short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Changes some features like artifact color, summoning troops, adding fake pfp, search bar e.t.c

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: an extension for rise in time. it lets you play the game more easily. features like auto reroll. or summon troops let you save time. and we all know how hard it is for telling the artifact colors apart but now you can change them.
